title: Could accused wife-killer Rod Covlin walk free because of bungled investigation?
itunes:title: Could accused wife-killer Rod Covlin walk free because of bungled investigation?
description:
New York millionaire Rod Covlin's trial for the murder of his stockbroker wife is nearing an end, but court observers say police bungling of the crime scene investigation make the chances of a conviction uncertain. Nancy Grace explores the case with a panel including forensics expert Karen Smith, psychologist Caryn Stark, North Carolina family and divorce lawyer Kathleen Murphy, and Crime Stories reporter Robyn Walensky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
